TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Toolset extends System.Object

span.span: Represent an aggregation of a tools version (eg.

summary.span: “2.0”）、工具路径以及可选的关联属性集的聚合。

span.span: "2.0"), tools path, and optional set of associated properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已撤消：（danmose）评审不可变性。UNDONE: (danmose) Review immutability. 如果这不是不可变的，请添加一种机制，通知项目集合拥有它以增加其 toolsetVersion。If this is not immutable, add a mechanism to notify the project collection/s owning it to increment their toolsetVersion.

summary.span: 创建一个具有给定的工具版本和工具路径的工具集。

summary.span: 将从给定的项目集合中获取全局属性、保留属性和环境属性。

span.span: Global, reserved, and environment properties are taken from the given project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultSubToolsetVersion { get; }
.property instance string DefaultSubToolsetVersion
Public ReadOnly Property DefaultSubToolsetVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultSubToolsetVersion { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.DefaultSubToolsetVersion : string

summary.span: 获取此工具集的默认子工具集版本。

span.span: Gets the default sub toolset version for this toolset.
The default sub toolset version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果安装了 [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]，请使用基本工具集并返回 "10.0" 的子工具集版本。If [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] is installed, use the base toolset and return a sub toolset version of "10.0". 否则，请使用找到的最高版本的子工具集。Otherwise, use the highest-versioned sub toolset found. 具有编号版本的子工具集按数值顺序排列;任何其他子工具集都按找到的顺序预置到列表的开头。Sub toolsets with numbered versions are ordered numerically; any additional sub toolsets are prepended to the beginning of the list in the order found. 如果没有可用的子工具集且未安装 [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]，则返回 null。Returns null if there is no sub toolset available and [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] is not installed.

summary.span: 创建将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GenerateSubToolsetVersion ();
.method public hidebysig instance string GenerateSubToolsetVersion() cil managed
Public Function GenerateSubToolsetVersion () As String
public: System::String ^ GenerateSubToolsetVersion();
member this.GenerateSubToolsetVersion : unit -> string

summary.span: 创建将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

returns.span: 将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: The sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 "VisualStudioVersion" 设置为工具集自身上的属性，则子工具集版本设置为 "VisualStudioVersion"。If "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否则，子工具集版本设置为工具集的 DefaultSubToolsetVersion。Otherwise, sub toolset version is set to the DefaultSubToolsetVersion of the toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GenerateSubToolsetVersion (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> overrideGlobalProperties, int solutionVersion);
.method public hidebysig instance string GenerateSubToolsetVersion(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> overrideGlobalProperties, int32 solutionVersion) cil managed
Public Function GenerateSubToolsetVersion (overrideGlobalProperties As IDictionary(Of String, String), solutionVersion As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GenerateSubToolsetVersion(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ overrideGlobalProperties, int solutionVersion);
member this.GenerateSubToolsetVersion : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, string> * int -> string

param.name: overrideGlobalProperties
param.span: 设置全局属性以用以创建子工具集版本。

span.span: Set of global properties to use to create the sub toolset version.

param.span: 可能为 null。

span.span: May be null.

param.name: solutionVersion
param.span: 使用创建子工具集版本的解决方案版本。

span.span: The solution version to use to create the sub toolset version.

summary.span: 创建将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.
The sub toolset version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传入的全局属性集中存在 "VisualStudioVersion" 全局属性，则子工具集版本设置为 "VisualStudioVersion"。If the "VisualStudioVersion" global property exists in the set of global properties passed in, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否则，如果将 "VisualStudioVersion" 设置为工具集自身上的属性，则子工具集版本设置为 "VisualStudioVersion"。Otherwise, if "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否则，如果将对应于解决方案版本（Visual Studio version = 解决方案版本-1）的 Visual Studio 版本映射到现有的子工具集，则子工具集版本将设置为 Visual Studio 版本。Otherwise, if the Visual Studio version corresponding to the solution version (Visual Studio version = solution version - 1) passed in maps to an existing sub toolset, then sub toolset version is set to the Visual Studio version. 否则，子工具集版本设置为工具集的 DefaultSubToolsetVersion。Otherwise, sub toolset version is set to the DefaultSubToolsetVersion of the toolset.

summary.span: 获取给定属性名称和子工具集版本指定的属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在子工具集中找不到该属性，则在基本工具集中搜索该属性。If the property is not found in the sub toolset, searches for the property in the base toolset. 如果在子工具集或基工具集中找不到该属性，则返回 null。If the property is not found in the sub toolset or the base toolset, returns null.
